get_table_columns.description: Get columns for a specific table

get_upstream_lineage.description: Get upstream lineage for an entity

get_downstream_lineage.description: Get downstream lineage for an entity

find_entity_by_name.cypher: MATCH (n) WHERE toLower(n.name) CONTAINS toLower($name_pattern) RETURN n

get_graph_stats.cypher: MATCH (n) RETURN labels(n) as label, count(*) as count

get_relationship_stats.cypher: MATCH ()-[r]->() RETURN type(r) as type, count(*) as count
